title: What are some Japanese artists similar to Miyavi? - Quora

response.answer_text: I would choose these artists ; Gackt , Hotei, Sugizo. Gackt https://open.spotify.com/artist/4cShXyYZpvnVZYeE3Oukns https://open.spotify.com/artist/6crEqOlFP6no2flmuas6P7 However, it’s hard to choose specific similar artist(s) to Miyavi because he has been developing his own mixed style with plenty genres of music like Rock, Funk, New generation Rock, Dance, and even Japanese traditional music.
